attributes.additional_details:
No Minutes are taken of this court's proceedings, so no-one has a legal body there, so Habeas Corpus is denied.  This is illegal.
We desire that Minutes be taken of Magistrates' Courts' proceedings, that all judgements made therein in the last 10 years be voided because illegal; and that all parties involved in this criminal conspiracy against the rule of law be punished most severely for their successful  conspiracy to pervert the course of Justice.
